gov.ornl.keva.table

Class TableKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.ornl.keva.table.TableKey
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<TableKey>

    public class TableKey
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<TableKey>
    Table keys uniquely identify a set of table values in the memtable and sstables. Internally, table keys use an array of bytes to store the actual key. In addition, table keys are data type aware (they store an optional string identifying the data).
    Author:
    James Horey
